page.title: 09SWIMMING IN SCARBOROUGH
page.content: As Scarborough is a seaside town it is not surprising that swimming is very popular.Children and adults take advantage of the three swimming pools in the town.The Waterscene which has two of the longest slides in Europe offers outdoor facilities and heated water.The Indoor Pool hosts the Scarborough Kingfisher Club and the Scarborough Amateur Swimming Club whilst the south pool provides facilities for holiday makers and the Scarborough Long Distance Swimming Club.School swimming is no longer financed by the County but many schools offer swimming financed by voluntary subscriptions. Gladstone Road Junior School has an active swimming group and uses the 12m pool at the North Riding College.The 8 year old pupils also receive basic swimming instruction weekly.
